column2: select x.district_code, x.ro_code, x.deed_year, x.Book, x.Volume_no, count(*) as "Count_of_Deeds",sum(x.count_of_persons) as count_of_persons from ( select a.District_Code, a.RO_Code, a.Deed_year, a.Book, a.Volume_No, a.deed_no, count(distinct b.Item_no) as count_of_persons from deed_details a, index_of_name b where a.District_Code = b.District_Code and a.RO_Code = b.RO_Code and a.Deed_year = b.Deed_year and a.Book = b.Book and a.book = '3' and a.Deed_no = b.Deed_no group by b.District_Code, b.RO_Code, b.Deed_year, b.Book, b.Deed_no order by a.deed_year, a.Volume_No, a.Deed_no desc ) x group by x.district_code, x.ro_code, x.deed_year, x.Book, x.Volume_no order by x.district_code, x.ro_code, x.deed_year, x.Book, convert(x.volume_no, unsigned integer)
select distinct deed_year as Year, book as Book,volume_no as Volume, count(*) as Nos from deed_details where book = '3' group by deed_year, book,convert(volume_no, unsigned integer)

select x.district_code, x.ro_code, x.deed_year, x.Book, x.Volume_no, x.deed_no, sum(x.count_of_persons) as count_of_persons from ( select a.District_Code, a.RO_Code, a.Deed_year, a.Book, a.Volume_No, a.deed_no, count(distinct b.Item_no) as count_of_persons from deed_details a, index_of_name b where  a.District_Code = b.District_Code and a.RO_Code = b.RO_Code and a.Deed_year = b.Deed_year and a.Book = b.Book and a.book = '3' and a.Deed_no = b.Deed_no group by b.District_Code, b.RO_Code, b.Deed_year, b.Book, b.Deed_no order by a.deed_year, a.Volume_No, a.Deed_no desc ) x group by x.district_code, x.ro_code, x.deed_year, x.Book, x.Volume_no, x.deed_no order by x.district_code, x.ro_code, x.deed_year, x.Book, x.volume_no, convert(x.deed_no, unsigned integer)

SELECT Created_Date_Persons AS "Created_Date", Created_by AS "Created_By", COUNT(*) AS "Count_of_Deeds",SUM(x.count_of_persons) AS "Count_of_Persons" FROM (SELECT a.District_Code, a.RO_Code, a.Deed_year, a.Book, a.deed_no, b.created_by, CAST(DATE_FORMAT(b.created_dttm, '%Y/%m/%d') AS CHAR(20)) AS Created_date_persons,count(distinct b.deed_no)as deed_cou, COUNT(DISTINCT b.Item_no) AS count_of_persons FROM deed_details a, index_of_name b WHERE a.District_Code = b.District_Code  AND a.RO_Code = b.RO_Code AND a.Deed_year = b.Deed_year AND a.Book = b.Book AND a.book = '3' AND a.Deed_no = b.Deed_no  GROUP BY b.District_Code, b.RO_Code, b.Deed_year, b.Book, b.Deed_no, b.Deed_no, b.created_by, created_date_persons ORDER BY a.deed_year, a.Deed_no DESC ) X GROUP BY x.created_by,created_date_persons ORDER BY x.created_by, x.district_code, x.ro_code, x.deed_year, x.Book
